00037 BOOLEAN gfShowTerrainTileButtons;
00038 UINT8 ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS];
00039 UINT16 usTotalWeight;
00040 BOOLEAN fPrevShowTerrainTileButtons = TRUE;
00041 BOOLEAN fUseTerrainWeights = FALSE;
00042 INT32 TerrainTileSelected = 0, TerrainForegroundTile, TerrainBackgroundTile;
00043 INT32 TerrainTileDrawMode = TERRAIN_TILES_NODRAW;
00044 
00045 void EntryInitEditorTerrainInfo()
00046 {
00047       //ResetTerrainTileWeights();
00048       if( !fUseTerrainWeights )
00049       {
00050             ResetTerrainTileWeights();
00051       }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void ResetTerrainTileWeights()
00055 {
00056       INT8 x;
00057       for( x=0; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00058       {
00059             ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[x] = 0;
00060       }
00061       usTotalWeight = 0;
00062       fUseTerrainWeights = FALSE;
00063       gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void HideTerrainTileButtons()
00067 {
00068       INT8 x;
00069       if( gfShowTerrainTileButtons )
00070       {
00071             for( x = BASE_TERRAIN_TILE_REGION_ID; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00072             {
00073                   DisableEditorRegion( x );
00074             }
00075             gfShowTerrainTileButtons=FALSE;     
00076       }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void ShowTerrainTileButtons()
00080 {
00081       INT8 x;
00082       if( !gfShowTerrainTileButtons )
00083       {
00084             for( x = BASE_TERRAIN_TILE_REGION_ID; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00085             {
00086                   EnableEditorRegion( x );
00087             }
00088             gfShowTerrainTileButtons=TRUE;      
00089       }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void RenderTerrainTileButtons()
00093 {
00094       // If needed, display the ground tile images
00095       if(gfShowTerrainTileButtons)
00096       {
00097             UINT16 usFillColorDark, usFillColorLight, usFillColorRed;
00098             UINT16 x, usX, usX2, usY, usY2;
00099 
00100             usFillColorDark = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(24, 61, 81));
00101             usFillColorLight = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(136, 138, 135));
00102             usFillColorRed = Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(255, 0, 0));
00103 
00104             usY = 369;
00105             usY2 = 391;
00106 
00107             SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
00108             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00109 
00110             for( x = 0; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00111             {
00112                   usX = 261 + (x * 42);
00113                   usX2 = usX + 42;
00114 
00115                   if ( x == CurrentPaste && !fUseTerrainWeights )
00116                   {
00117                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer , usX, usY, usX2, usY2, usFillColorRed);
00118                   }
00119                   else
00120                   {
00121                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer, usX, usY, usX2, usY2, usFillColorDark);
00122                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer, usX + 1, usY + 1, usX2, usY2, usFillColorLight);
00123                   }
00124                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea(ButtonDestBuffer, usX + 1, usY + 1, usX2 - 1, usY2 - 1, 0);
00125                   
00126                   SetObjectShade( gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[x]].hTileSurface, DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL );
00127                   BltVideoObject(ButtonDestBuffer, gTileDatabase[gTileTypeStartIndex[x]].hTileSurface, 0, (usX + 1), (usY + 1), 
00128                                                              VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL);
00129 
00130                   if( fUseTerrainWeights )
00131                   {
00132                         mprintf( usX+2, usY+2, L"%d", ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[ x ] );
00133                   }
00134             }
00135       }
00136 }
00137 
00138 //This callback is used for each of the terrain tile buttons.  The userData[0] field
00139 //contains the terrain button's index value.
00140 void TerrainTileButtonRegionCallback(MOUSE_REGION *reg,INT32 reason)
00141 {
00142       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00143       {
00144             gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00145             TerrainTileSelected = MSYS_GetRegionUserData(reg,0);
00146             if(TerrainTileDrawMode == TERRAIN_TILES_FOREGROUND )
00147             {
00148                   TerrainForegroundTile = TerrainTileSelected;
00149                   CurrentPaste = (UINT16)TerrainForegroundTile;
00150                   //iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_DRAW;                     
00151                   if( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
00152                   { 
00153                         fUseTerrainWeights = TRUE;
00154                   }
00155                   if( fUseTerrainWeights )
00156                   {
00157                         //SHIFT+LEFTCLICK adds weight to the selected terrain tile.
00158                         if( ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[ TerrainTileSelected ] < 10 )
00159                         {
00160                               ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[ TerrainTileSelected ]++;
00161                               usTotalWeight++;
00162                         }
00163                   }
00164                   else 
00165                   { //Regular LEFTCLICK selects only that terrain tile.
00166                         //When total weight is 0, then the only selected tile is drawn.
00167                         ResetTerrainTileWeights();
00168                   }
00169             }
00170             else if(TerrainTileDrawMode == TERRAIN_TILES_BACKGROUND )
00171             {
00172                   TerrainBackgroundTile = TerrainTileSelected;
00173                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_SET_BGRND;
00174             }
00175       }
00176       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00177       {
00178             gfRenderTaskbar = TRUE;
00179             TerrainTileSelected = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( reg, 0 );
00180             if(TerrainTileDrawMode == TERRAIN_TILES_FOREGROUND )
00181             {
00182                   TerrainForegroundTile = TerrainTileSelected;
00183                   iEditorToolbarState = TBAR_MODE_DRAW;
00184                   if( ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[ TerrainTileSelected ] )
00185                   {
00186                         ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[ TerrainTileSelected ]--;
00187                         usTotalWeight--;
00188                   }
00189             }
00190       }
00191 }
00192 
00193 void ChooseWeightedTerrainTile()
00194 {
00195       UINT16 x, usWeight;
00196       INT16 sRandomNum;
00197       if(!usTotalWeight)
00198       { //Not in the weighted mode.  CurrentPaste will already contain the selected tile.
00199             return;
00200       }
00201       sRandomNum = rand() % usTotalWeight;
00202       x = NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS;
00203       for( x = 0; x < NUM_TERRAIN_TILE_REGIONS; x++ )
00204       {
00205             usWeight = ubTerrainTileButtonWeight[ x ];
00206             sRandomNum -= usWeight;
00207             if( sRandomNum <= 0 && usWeight )
00208             {
00209                   CurrentPaste = x;
00210                   return;
00211             }
00212       }
00213 }

00216 UINT32 guiSearchType;
00217 // TODO: change this variable name if not too time consuming (jonathanl)
00218 extern UINT32 count; // symbol exist already in gamescreen.cpp, this is a REALLY bad global symbol name!!! (jonathanl)
00219 UINT32 maxCount=0, calls=0;
00220 
00221 void Fill( INT32 x, INT32 y )
00222 {
00223       INT32 iMapIndex;
00224       UINT32 uiCheckType;
00225 
00226       count++;
00227       calls++;
00228 
00229       if( count > maxCount )
00230             maxCount = count;
00231       
00232       iMapIndex = y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00233       if( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16)iMapIndex ) )
00234       {
00235             count--;
00236             return;
00237       }
00238       GetTileType( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex , &uiCheckType );
00239       if( guiSearchType == uiCheckType )
00240             PasteTextureCommon( iMapIndex );
00241       else
00242       {
00243             count--;
00244             return;
00245       }
00246 
00247       if( y > 0 )
00248             Fill( x, y-1 );
00249       if( y < WORLD_ROWS - 1 )
00250             Fill( x, y+1 );
00251       if( x > 0 )
00252             Fill( x-1, y );
00253       if( x < WORLD_COLS - 1 )
00254             Fill( x+1, y );
00255       count--;
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 void TerrainFill( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00260 {
00261       INT16 sX, sY;
00262       //determine what we should be looking for to replace...
00263       GetTileType( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex, &guiSearchType );
00264       
00265       //check terminating conditions
00266       if( guiSearchType == CurrentPaste )
00267             return;
00268       
00269       ConvertGridNoToXY( (INT16)iMapIndex, &sX, &sY );
00270 
00271       count = 0;
00272             
00273       Fill( sX, sY );
00274 
00275 }
